name: Surprised Dream
description:
Dreaming in a dream and being surprised by something...

In this game you become someone who is working overtime In-game short story: You just finished work, and want to eat. You go into the kitchen and... W.A.S.DMove1ShiftSneaking2
  • Requires medium computer specs to play better
  • Required to use Headset / Earphones to get a good gaming experience
  • Minimum computer volume when wearing a headset / earphone: 40%
    Maximum : 80%
  • Minimum computer volume when not wearing a headset / earphone: 80%
    Maximum : 100%
!WARNING! This game contains moderate jumpscare, If you have heart disease, please don't play this game! Thank you for visiting my itch.io, if you are interested in this game I made, please download it, if your hands are itching to support YapGamedev on itch.io, click follow <3. 1 Follow from you = 100% Damage to fight laziness from YapGamedev Developers....
